article: the united nations children 's fund -lrb- unicef -rrb- , in cooperation with the world health organization -lrb- who -rrb- , is intensifying their support to the mozambican government 's efforts in the fight against the cholera epidemic , local media reported on friday .
abstract: unicef supports mozambique to combat cholera
